thread.title: BRIEF-White Mountains To Acquire A Majority Stake In NSM Insurance Group

title: BRIEF-White Mountains To Acquire A Majority Stake In NSM Insurance Group

organizations.name: brief-white mountains to acquire a majority stake in nsm insurance group

text:
April 2, 2018 / 12:09 PM / a minute ago BRIEF-White Mountains To Acquire A Majority Stake In NSM Insurance Group Reuters Staff 
April 2 (Reuters) - White Mountains Insurance Group Ltd : 
* WHITE MOUNTAINS TO ACQUIRE A MAJORITY STAKE IN NSM INSURANCE GROUP * TRANSACTION VALUES NSM AT APPROXIMATELY $388 MILLION. 
* ‍INTENDS TO FUND ACQUISITION THROUGH A COMBINATION OF CASH ON HAND AND NEW DEBT ISSUED BY NSM​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
